trans-unit.source: Discovers the attributes of an event and provides access to event metadata.
trans-unit.target: 发现事件的属性并提供对事件元数据的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> class to inspect events and to hook up event handlers, as shown in the example code for the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>类检查事件并挂钩事件处理程序中的代码示例所示<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> is not intended to be used to raise events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> 不是要用于引发事件。

trans-unit.source: An object raises events as dictated by its internal state.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象由其内部状态指示引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Events are used with delegates.
trans-unit.target: 事件与委托一起使用。

trans-unit.source: An event listener instantiates an event-handler delegate that is invoked whenever the event is raised by an event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件侦听器实例化无论引发的事件源，都会调用事件处理程序委托。

trans-unit.source: In order to connect to the event source, the event listener adds this delegate to the invocation list on the source.
trans-unit.target: 若要连接到事件源，事件侦听器将此委托添加到源上的调用列表。

trans-unit.source: When the event is raised, the invoke method of the event-handler delegate is called.
trans-unit.target: 当引发事件时，调用事件处理程序委托的 invoke 方法。

trans-unit.source: Both multicast and single-cast event notifications are supported.
trans-unit.target: 支持这两个多路广播和单路事件通知。

trans-unit.source: The `Add` and `Remove` methods, as well as the event-handler delegate class associated with an event, must be marked in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: `Add`和`Remove`方法，以及与事件相关联的事件处理程序委托类都必须在该元数据标记。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are object-oriented function pointers.
trans-unit.target: 委托是面向对象的函数指针。

trans-unit.source: In C or C++, a function pointer is a reference to a method.
trans-unit.target: 在 C 或 c + + 中，函数指针是对方法的引用。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to the C or C++ function pointer, a delegate contains two references: a reference to a method and a reference to an object that supports the method.
trans-unit.target: 委托与 C 或 c + + 函数指针，包含两个引用： 对一种方法还对支持该方法的对象的引用的引用。

trans-unit.source: Delegates can invoke a method without knowing the class type that declares or inherits the method.
trans-unit.target: 委托可以调用一个方法，而不必知道类类型声明或继承的方法。

trans-unit.source: Delegates need only know the return type and parameter list of the method.
trans-unit.target: 委托只需知道该方法的返回类型和参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The event model works equally well for single-cast and multicast delegates.
trans-unit.target: 事件模型适用于单强制转换和多路广播委托。

trans-unit.source: When the delegate's invoke method is called, only a single object will have a method called on it.
trans-unit.target: 委托的调用时调用方法时，只有单个对象可以对它调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A multicast modifier can be applied to a delegate declaration, which allows multiple methods to be called when the invoke method of the delegate is called.
trans-unit.target: 多路广播的修饰符可以应用于允许使用多个方法，该委托的 invoke 方法调用时要调用的委托声明中。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> on `EventInfo` when the `inherit` parameter of `GetCustomAttributes` is `true` does not walk the type hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>上`EventInfo`时`inherit`参数`GetCustomAttributes`是`true`不会遍历的类型层次结构。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Attribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> to inherit custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Attribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>继承自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code gets an <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> object for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码获取<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>类。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see langword="EventInfo" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod(System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod(System.Boolean)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see langword="EventInfo" />，必须重写以下成员： <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod(System.Boolean)" />， <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod(System.Boolean)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod(System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="EventInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="EventInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: The event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a method or methods to be invoked when the event is raised by the target.
trans-unit.target: 封装当目标引发事件时要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler to an event source.
trans-unit.target: 将事件处理程序添加到事件源。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to add a delegate to synchronize the event on the target object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法尝试将添加要同步目标对象上的事件的委托。

trans-unit.source: Each time the event is raised by the target parameter, the method or methods encapsulated by the handler will be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 每次引发事件时由目标参数的方法或处理程序封装的方法将调用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to load an assembly, create an instance of a type from the assembly, create an event handler using a dynamic assembly, and hook up the dynamic event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何加载程序集、 从程序集创建的一种类型的实例、 创建使用动态程序集，一个事件处理程序和动态事件处理程序挂钩。

trans-unit.source: All actions are performed using late binding.
trans-unit.target: 使用后期绑定来执行所有操作。

trans-unit.source: The code example loads System.dll and creates an instance of the <xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例加载 System.dll 并创建的实例<xref:System.Timers.Timer?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Type.GetEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to get the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed> event, and the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.EventHandlerType%2A> property to get the delegate type for the event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Type.GetEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以获取<xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed>事件，和<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.EventHandlerType%2A>属性以获取个事件的委托类型。

trans-unit.source: The code example gets a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> for the `Invoke` method of the delegate type, and from the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> obtains the signature of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>为`Invoke`方法的委托类型，并从<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>获取的签名与委托。

trans-unit.source: The code example then creates a dynamic assembly with one module containing a single type named `Handler`, and gives the type a `static` method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `DynamicHandler` that will be used to handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例将然后创建了一个模块，其中包含名为的单个类型的动态程序集`Handler`，并为该类型提供`static`方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中的方法) 名为`DynamicHandler`将用于处理该事件。

trans-unit.source: After the dynamic type is created, the code example gets a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> for the finished method and uses it to create a delegate instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建动态类型后，此代码示例将获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>完成方法并使用它来创建委托实例。

trans-unit.source: This instance is passed to the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler%2A> method to hook up the event.
trans-unit.target: 此实例传递给<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler%2A>挂接事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The program then pauses to allow the event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 然后，程序暂停以允许引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The event does not have a public <see langword="add" /> accessor.
trans-unit.target: 该事件没有公共 <see langword="add" /> 访问器。

trans-unit.source: The handler that was passed in cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 无法使用传入的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" />, instead.
trans-unit.target: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获基类异常 <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have access permission to the member.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有对成员的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> and the event is not static.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />，并且此事件不是静态事件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> is not declared on the target.
trans-unit.target: 未在目标上声明 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object for the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler(System.Object,System.Delegate)" /> method of the event, including non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: 获取事件的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler(System.Object,System.Delegate)" /> 方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，包括非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object for the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler(System.Object,System.Delegate)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 方法的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler(System.Object,System.Delegate)" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is the equivalent of calling the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod%2A> with a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等效于调用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod%2A>值为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes for this event.
trans-unit.target: 获取此事件的属性。

trans-unit.source: The read-only attributes for this event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的只读特性。

trans-unit.source: The attributes are returned in a 4-byte integer representing a bitmap of the attributes set for the event reflected by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此实例反射的事件设置的属性的位图的 4 字节整数中的属性。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this instance, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此实例进行比较的对象，或为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例是否与指定的对象相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等于此实例的类型和值，则为 <paramref name="obj" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="Type" /> object of the underlying event-handler delegate associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此事件关联的基础事件处理程序委托的 <see langword="Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see langword="Type" /> object representing the delegate event handler.
trans-unit.target: 表示委托事件处理程序的只读 <see langword="Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.EventHandlerType%2A> property to discover the delegate type of an event and to display its parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.EventHandlerType%2A>属性来发现事件的委托类型并显示其参数类型。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a delegate named `MyDelegate` and an event named `ev` of type `MyDelegate`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了名为的委托`MyDelegate`以及一个名为的事件`ev`类型的`MyDelegate`。

trans-unit.source: The code in the `Main` method discovers the event signature by getting the delegate type of the event, getting the `Invoke` method of the delegate type, and then retrieving and displaying the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 中的代码`Main`方法发现通过获取该事件的委托类型的事件签名获取`Invoke`的委托类型，然后检索并显示参数的方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method used to add an event handler delegate to the event source.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于向事件源添加事件处理程序委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method used to add an event handler delegate to the event source.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于向事件源添加事件处理程序委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the method used to add an event handler delegate to the event source.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，表示用于向事件源添加事件处理程序委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: `GetAddMethod` initializes and adds the event subscribe method.
trans-unit.target: `GetAddMethod` 初始化并将事件添加 subscribe 方法。

trans-unit.source: The `AddEventHandler` method is used to add an event-handler delegate to the invocation list of an event source.
trans-unit.target: `AddEventHandler`方法用于将一个事件处理程序委托添加到事件源调用列表。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method has the following signature:
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该方法具有以下签名：

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if non-public methods can be returned; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以返回非公共方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the <see langword="MethodInfo" /> object for the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler(System.Object,System.Delegate)" /> method of the event, specifying whether to return non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，为事件的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.EventInfo.AddEventHandler(System.Object,System.Delegate)" /> 方法检索 <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 对象，指定是否返回非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the method used to add an event handler delegate to the event source.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，表示用于向事件源添加事件处理程序委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `GetAddMethod` initializes and adds the event subscribe method as a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: `GetAddMethod`初始化并将事件添加订阅作为布尔值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `AddEventHandler` method is used to add an event-handler delegate to the invocation list of an event source.
trans-unit.target: `AddEventHandler`方法用于将一个事件处理程序委托添加到事件源调用列表。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method has the following signature:
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该方法具有以下签名：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="true" />, the method used to add an event handler delegate is non-public, and the caller does not have permission to reflect on non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 为 <see langword="true" />，用于添加事件处理程序委托的方法为非公共方法，且调用方没有权限反映非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the methods that were associated with an event in MSIL using the <see langword=".other" /> directive.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 MSIL 中使用 <see langword=".other" /> 指令与事件相关联的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the public methods that have been associated with an event in metadata using the <see langword=".other" /> directive.
trans-unit.target: 返回在元数据中使用 <see langword=".other" /> 指令与事件相关联的公共方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects representing the public methods that have been associated with the event in metadata by using the <see langword=".other" /> directive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示已在元数据中通过使用 <see langword=".other" /> 指令与事件相关联的公共方法。

trans-unit.source: If there are no such public methods, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此类公共方法，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: The metadata for an event can associate four kinds of methods with the event:
trans-unit.target: 事件的元数据可以将四种类型的方法与事件相关联：

trans-unit.source: The `.addon` directive specifies the method used to add event handlers.
trans-unit.target: `.addon`指令指定用来添加事件处理程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> for that method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>该方法。

trans-unit.source: The `.removeon` directive specifies the method used to detach event handlers.
trans-unit.target: `.removeon`指令指定用来分离事件处理程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> for that method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>该方法。

trans-unit.source: The `.fire` directive specifies the method used to raise the event.
trans-unit.target: `.fire`指令指定用来引发事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> for that method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>该方法。

trans-unit.source: The `.other` directive specifies any other methods associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: `.other`指令指定与事件关联的任何其他方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetOtherMethods%2A> method to retrieve an array of <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> objects for those methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetOtherMethods%2A>方法来检索其中的数组<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>这些方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: The methods associated with an event using the `.other` directive have no special significance to the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 与事件使用关联的方法`.other`指令具有对运行时没有特别的意义。

trans-unit.source: The C# and Visual Basic compilers do not use the `.other` directive.
trans-unit.target: 不使用 C# 和 Visual Basic 编译器`.other`指令。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include non-public methods; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果包括非公共方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the methods that have been associated with the event in metadata using the <see langword=".other" /> directive, specifying whether to include non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: 返回在元数据中使用 <see langword=".other" /> 指令与事件相关联的方法，指定是否包括非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects representing methods that have been associated with an event in metadata by using the <see langword=".other" /> directive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示已通过在元数据中使用 <see langword=".other" /> 指令与事件相关联的方法。

trans-unit.source: If there are no methods matching the specification, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与该规范匹配的方法，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: The metadata for an event can associate four kinds of methods with the event:
trans-unit.target: 事件的元数据可以将四种类型的方法与事件相关联：

trans-unit.source: The `.addon` directive specifies the method used to add event handlers.
trans-unit.target: `.addon`指令指定用来添加事件处理程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> for that method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetAddMethod%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>该方法。

trans-unit.source: The `.removeon` directive specifies the method used to detach event handlers.
trans-unit.target: `.removeon`指令指定用来分离事件处理程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> for this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>为此方法。

trans-unit.source: The `.fire` directive specifies the method used to raise the event.
trans-unit.target: `.fire`指令指定用来引发事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> for this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>为此方法。

trans-unit.source: The `.other` directive specifies any other methods associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: `.other`指令指定与事件关联的任何其他方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetOtherMethods%2A> method to retrieve an array of <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> objects for those methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetOtherMethods%2A>方法来检索其中的数组<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>这些方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: The methods associated with an event using the `.other` directive have no special significance to the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 与事件使用关联的方法`.other`指令具有对运行时没有特别的意义。

trans-unit.source: The C# and Visual Basic compilers do not use the `.other` directive.
trans-unit.target: 不使用 C# 和 Visual Basic 编译器`.other`指令。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that is called when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回引发事件时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that is called when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回引发事件时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method that is called when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method usually returns `null` for events declared with the C# `event` keyword or the Visual Basic `Event` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常返回`null`事件声明使用 C#`event`关键字或 Visual Basic`Event`关键字。

trans-unit.source: This is because the C# and Visual Basic compilers do not generate such a method by default.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 C# 和 Visual Basic 编译器不生成此类方法默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if non-public methods can be returned; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以返回非公共方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the method that is called when the event is raised, specifying whether to return non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，返回引发事件时调用的方法，指定是否返回非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="MethodInfo" /> object that was called when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时调用的 <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method usually returns `null` for events declared with the C# `event` keyword or the Visual Basic `Event` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常返回`null`事件声明使用 C#`event`关键字或 Visual Basic`Event`关键字。

trans-unit.source: This is because the C# and Visual Basic compilers do not generate such a method by default.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 C# 和 Visual Basic 编译器不生成此类方法默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="true" />, the method used to add an event handler delegate is non-public, and the caller does not have permission to reflect on non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 为 <see langword="true" />，用于添加事件处理程序委托的方法为非公共方法，且调用方没有权限反映非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method used to remove an event handler delegate from the event source.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于从事件源删除事件处理程序委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method used to remove an event handler delegate from the event source.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于从事件源删除事件处理程序委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the method used to remove an event handler delegate from the event source.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，表示用于从事件源删除事件处理程序委托的方法。

trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该方法具有以下签名：

trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果可以返回非公共方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the <see langword="MethodInfo" /> object for removing a method of the event, specifying whether to return non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，检索用于删除事件方法的 <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 对象，指定是否返回非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the method used to remove an event handler delegate from the event source.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，表示用于从事件源删除事件处理程序委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method has the following signature:
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，该方法具有以下签名：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="true" />, the method used to add an event handler delegate is non-public, and the caller does not have permission to reflect on non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 为 <see langword="true" />，用于添加事件处理程序委托的方法为非公共方法，且调用方没有权限反映非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the event is multicast.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示事件是否为多播。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the delegate is an instance of a multicast delegate; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托是多播委托的实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see langword="EventInfo" /> has a name with a special meaning.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see langword="EventInfo" /> 是否具有一个有特殊意义的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this event has a special name; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此事件具有一个特殊名称，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the event's name has a special meaning.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定事件的名称是否具有特殊含义。

trans-unit.source: Names that begin with or contain an underscore character (_), property accessors, and operator overloading methods are examples of names that might require special treatment by some compilers.
trans-unit.target: 可能需要特殊处理的某些编译器的名称的示例的开头或包含下划线字符 (_)、 属性访问器和运算符重载方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> value indicating that this member is an event.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> 值，指示此成员为一个事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> value indicating that this member is an event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> 值，指示此成员为一个事件。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将替代<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you examine a set of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects — for example, the array returned by <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A> — the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A> property returns <xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Event?displayProperty=nameWithType> only when a given member is an event.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当检查一组<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>对象-例如，返回的数组<xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A>-<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Event?displayProperty=nameWithType>仅当给定的成员是一个事件。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示两个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="left" /> is equal to <paramref name="right" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等于 <paramref name="left" />，则为 <paramref name="right" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示两个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="left" /> is not equal to <paramref name="right" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 不等于 <paramref name="left" />，则为 <paramref name="right" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the method that is called when the event is raised, including non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: 获取引发该事件时所调用的方法，包括非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: The method that is called when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This property is the equivalent of calling the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod%2A> with a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等效于调用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRaiseMethod%2A>值为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to be disassociated from the events raised by target.
trans-unit.target: 要从目标引发的事件解除关联的委托。

trans-unit.source: Removes an event handler from an event source.
trans-unit.target: 从事件源中删除事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to remove the delegate that may synchronize this event on the target object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法尝试删除可能同步目标对象上的，此事件的委托。

trans-unit.source: When an event is raised by target, the method or methods encapsulated by `handler` will no longer be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 通过目标、 方法或通过封装的方法引发事件时`handler`不再将调用。

trans-unit.source: The event does not have a public <see langword="remove" /> accessor.
trans-unit.target: 该事件没有公共 <see langword="remove" /> 访问器。

trans-unit.source: The handler that was passed in cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 无法使用传入的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> and the event is not static.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />，并且此事件不是静态事件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> is not declared on the target.
trans-unit.target: 未在目标上声明 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" />, instead.
trans-unit.target: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获基类异常 <see cref="T:System.MemberAccessException" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have access permission to the member.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有对成员的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="MethodInfo" /> object for removing a method of the event, including non-public methods.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于删除事件方法的 <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 对象，包括非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="MethodInfo" /> object for removing a method of the event.
trans-unit.target: 用于移除该事件方法的 <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is the equivalent of calling the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod%2A> with a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等效于调用<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo.GetRemoveMethod%2A>值为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的名称的传入数组。

trans-unit.source: Count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要映射的名称的计数。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解释名称的区域设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 调用方分配的数组，用于接收与名称对应的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 将一组名称映射为对应的一组调度标识符。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 接口的后期绑定访问。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <c>T:System.Type</c> object representing the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 类型的 T:System.Type<c></c> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <c>T:System.Type</c> object representing the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 类型的 T:System.Type<c></c> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 类型信息的区域设置标识符。

trans-unit.source: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 接收一个指针，指向请求的类型信息对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 检索对象的类型信息，然后可以使用该信息获取接口的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 接口的后期绑定访问。

trans-unit.source: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个位置，该位置接收对象提供的类型信息接口的数量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 检索对象提供的类型信息接口的数量（0 或 1）。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 接口的后期绑定访问。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the member.
trans-unit.target: 标识成员。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 留待将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中解释参数的区域设置上下文。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述调用的上下文的标志。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个结构的指针，该结构包含一个自变量数组、一个命名自变量的 DISPID 自变量数组和数组中元素数的计数。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向要存储结果的位置的指针。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 指向一个包含异常信息的结构的指针。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一个出错自变量的索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供对某一对象公开的属性和方法的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`IDispatch::Invoke`，请参阅 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 接口的后期绑定访问。
